name: Jeweler
description: A craftsman who creates and sells precious jewelry; adventurers can commission custom pieces, appraise gems, or sell valuable stones and metals.
atmosphere: The shop is filled with the sparkle of precious metals and the subtle scent of fine craftsmanship. The sound of delicate tools working on precious stones creates a refined, luxurious atmosphere. The air carries the promise of beauty and the essential nature of adornment and wealth.
